24HRS_ORDER_SHIPPED_SEPARATELY: 24 hours delivery items will be delivered separately.
ANNOUCEMENT_CONTENT:
• Hanoi

    10/02 – Available for: Hoan Kiem, Ba Dinh, Dong Da, Cau Giay and Hai Ba Trung.

    From 11/02 to 14/02: Our delivery service is closed.

  • Ho Chi Minh City

    From 10/02 to 13/02 - Available for: District 1, 3 and Binh Thanh.

    14/02: Our delivery service is closed.

  • Da Nang, Nha Trang and Hai Phong

    From 10/02 to 14/02: Our delivery service is closed.

    • Our delivery services at other restaurants will close for Tet holiday from Wednesday, 10 February and reopen from Monday, 15 February.
ANNOUCEMENT_TITLE:
TET DELIVERY SCHEDULE!

We would like to announce our operating hours for delivery during Tet holiday below
CSA_COMMON_ERROR_PROBLEMS: There are some problems with your operation.
CSA_STEP_1: Where would you like us to deliver?
ERI_ALREADY_ERECEIPT: Bill has been issued E - Invoice
ERI_CUT_OFF_TIME: Time that system group bill to total bill
ERI_INSTRUCTION_COMPANY: Please fill in all fields below to proceed with exporting E-Invoice
ERI_JUST_FOR_REFERENCE: (For reference only, please check the information again)
ERI_POLICY_AWARE: Please be aware of our E - Invoice policy. By the law, we cannot support E - Invoice request under the following circumstances:
ERI_POLICY_ONE: Bill only can issue E - Invoice in day.
ERI_POLICY_TWO: Bill has been issued E - Invoice.
FOR_CASH_PAYMENT_SEND_SMS: A confirm order SMS has been sent to your mobile. Please double check.
MENU_DO_NOT_SETUP_TAX: Món chưa có trong m_menu hoặc m_menu_tax. Nhà hàng Liên Hệ Tech Team để được hỗ trợ
NOTFOUND_SHIPPING: Shipping request for this order was not found
NOTFOUND_STORE: Our sincere apologies, 4P’s delivery service does not support delivery to your current address. Please select another address, or call 19006043 for prompt assistance.
ORDER_ITEM_NOT_ENOUGH: Món A đang bị Sold Out ở POS. Nhà hàng vui lòng kiểm tra món sold out ở POS.
ORDER_TIMEOUT: It's over 15 minutes from your last interaction with this order. We will refresh the Delivery Time Option. Please review and pick your preferred delivery time. Thank you!
PAYMENT_METHODS_NOT_AVAILABLE: Hình thức thanh toán trong đơn này chưa tồn tại dưới POS, Nhà hàng liên hệ Tech Team để được hỗ trợ

PNAME_CHEESE_PLATTER_X_MAS_L_DESCRIPTION:
Christmas is finally here. Let’s celebrate this festive season deliciously with 4P’s Christmas Box full of our mouth-watering items.

This super - special holiday box contains a tasty pack of 7 pieces from our bestselling dishes, carefully prepared and sure to be the hit of every holiday party:
- Fried Chicken with Oriental Spice
- Parma Ham Wrap with Organic Rocket & Ricotta Cheese
- Oven Baked German Potato
- Kale Salad
- Seafood Croquettes with Tomato Sauce
- Camembert with Truffle-flavored Mascarpone
- Cold cuts

It’s gonna be a Christmas filled with delights, smiles and good food.

They only use organic rice from their own farm without chemical fertilizers or pesticides to brew this sake with traditional methods.

PNAME_SOUP_PUMPKIN_DESCRIPTION: This butternut pumpkin from an organic farm in Tay Ninh is cooked with milk tea using Hatvala Jasmine flowers, bringing you a special aroma and taste.
PNAME_SPICY_BOLOGNESE_BURRATA_L: (Only available in Da Nang) Spicy Bolognese Burrata (L)
PNAME_SPICY_BOLOGNESE_BURRATA_L_DESCRIPT: Spicy Bolognese and milky Burrata with spinach saute
PNAME_SPICY_BOLOGNESE_BURRATA_S: (Only available in Da Nang) Spicy Bolognese Burrata (S)
PNAME_SPICY_BOLOGNESE_BURRATA_S_DESCRIPT: Spicy Bolognese and milky Burrata with spinach saute
PNAME_SPICY_GARLIC_SHRIMP_PASTA: (Only available in Da Nang) Spicy Garlic Shrimp Pasta
PNAME_SPICY_GARLIC_SHRIMP_PASTA_DESCRIPT: Spicy and strong garlic, shrimp broth taste
PNAME_SPICY_HOMEMADE_SAUSAGE_PIZZA: (Only available in Da Nang) Spicy Homemade Sausage Pizza
PNAME_SPICY_HOMEMADE_SAUSAGE_PIZZA_DESCR: Homemade herb sausage, green pepper, broccoli, tomato sauce, Mozzarella, Grana Padano
PNAME_SPINACH_EGG_WITH_RICOTTA_CHEESE_PI: (Only available in Da Nang) Spinach Egg with Ricotta cheese Pizza
Eggs, spinach and garlic butter sauté, ricotta cheese, black pepper
PNAME_SQUID_INK_RISOTTO: Squid ink Risotto with Semi Dried Tomato and House-made Aioli Sauce
PNAME_SQUID_INK_RISOTTO_DESCRIPTION: Topped with baked squid and Grated house-made Caciocavallo
PNAME_STRING_CHEESE_PEPPER_DESCRIPTION: Our original house-made, pepper-flavored String Cheese
PNAME_STRING_CHEESE_PLAIN_DESCRIPTION: Our original house-made, regular-flavored String Cheese
PNAME_TANDOORI_CHICKEN_PIZZA_DESCRIPTION: Chicken and Okura cooked with House-made Curry sauce
PNAME_TERIYAKI_CHICKEN_FROZEN_PIZZA_DESC: A thin-crust snack Pizza packed with flavours from Teriyaki Chicken, cheese, mayonnaise, seaweed and perilla.Using the ‘flash-freezing’ method, the freshness and natural flavours of this pizza are still maintained.
PNAME_TERIYAKI_CHICKEN_PIZZA_DESCRIPTION: Sweet Soy sauce taste Chicken with Seaweed, Perilla and Mayonnaise
PNAME_TOMATO_SPAGHETTI: Tomato Spaghetti with House-made Mascarpone Cheese
PNAME_TOMATO_SPAGHETTI_DESCRIPTION:
Chili, Tomato Sauce, Mascarpone Cheese, Grana Padano.

**Saigon Pearl & Saigon Centre Exclusive
Dry pasta: known for its durability, versatility, and firm texture, dry spaghetti holds its own and delivers a satisfying al dente stage with perfect bite every time
Fresh pasta: uses artisanal spaghetti, which is carefully crafted with the finest ingredients, thanks to a tender texture and delicate properly cooked, it will help the sauce to penetrate more evenly into each strand
PNAME_TRUFFLE_BURRATA_PIE: Truffle Burrata Pie with Parma Ham
PNAME_TRUFFLE_BURRATA_PIE_WITH_PARMA_HAM: Truffle Burrata Pie with Parma Ham
PNAME_TUNA_PIZZA: Bambino pizza with House-made Tuna Confit and Sweet Corn
PNAME_VEGAN_SALAD: Evergreen Vegan Salad  with House-made Herbs Dressing "Green Goddess"
PNAME_VEGAN_SALAD_DESCRIPTION: A variety of Vegetables and Nuts, Cashew cream based dressing
PNAME_VEGETARIAN_KALE_PIZZA: Kale with House-made Lemon Ricotta with Olive and Caper sauce Pizza
PNAME_WHEY_CIDER_CAN_DESCRIPTION: Cider made with whey water from our cheese-making process, golden Vietnamese pineapples, local aromatic cinnamon and fruity Australian hops.
PNAME_WHEY_STOUT_BOTTLE_DESCRIPTION: Our sustainable dark beer made with Whey milk
PNAME_WHITE_SANGRIA_RTE_DESCRIPTION: White wine mixed with fruits and spices
PNAME_YALUMBA_DESCRIPTION: Classic Riesling aromas of citrus and grapefruit from south Australia
PNAME_ZUCCHINI_PIZZA_DESCRIPTION: Vegetarian, Zucchini Slice and Flower on Basil sauce base, Nuts

SCR_EGIFT_TERM_AND_CONDITION:
● The voucher is valid for 180 days from the date of issuance
● The voucher can be redeemed at restaurants or for ordering delivery on delivery.pizza4ps.com website.
● The voucher is valid for one bill only, one bill can be redeemed by many vouchers.
● The voucher is non-refundable and cannot be exchanged for cash in part or full.
● Expired vouchers and “already redeemed” vouchers will be rejected to be redeemed.
● Guests will settle the exceeding amount when the bill value is higher than the voucher/s value.
● Pizza 4P’s is responsible for issuing VAT invoices upon guest requests.
● Guests are responsible for the security of the voucher codes after purchasing. Giftpop and Pizza 4P’s are not responsible for the compensation of lost or unintentionally redeemed voucher codes under any circumstances.

SCR_GIFT_THANK_YOU_DESCRIPTION:
Dear [name]
Thank you for choosing Pizza 4P’s Gift.
At Pizza 4P's, our goal is to make our beloved guests happy. To ensure that you're truly satisfied, we’d be grateful if you could give us your honest feedback. This will also help us improve our services further.
Thank you and we will continue to do our best to make you happy!
Peace 🙂

order.get: You be able to get list of incoming orders from this system

product.get: You be able to get full list of products from this system
product.post: You be able to create a new product in this system
product.put: You be able to edit a product in this system

role.delete: You be able to delete a role (this requires 'role.permission.delete')
role.get: You be able to get all supported roles in this system

permission.delete: You be able to remove permission from a superior role

role.post: You be able to create a new role

user.delete: You be able to delete a role from any user

staff_all.get: You be able to get full list of staff members in this system

staff.get: You be able to get certain staff member by their email ID in this system
staff.patch: You be able to edit a new staff member info
staff.post: You be able to invite and create a new staff member in this system

store.get: You be able to get full list of stores in this system
store.patch: You be able to edit certain configurations of a store in this system
store.post: You be able to create a new store in this system
store.put: You be able to full edit a store info in this system
